translation.en: You're fuckin' dead.
Without you, I am dead.
translation.es: Sin ti, no tengo por qué vivir.

translation.en: Zoe!
-I can't believe we came to this. -Me neither.
translation.es: -No puedo creer que se termine así. -Tampoco yo.

translation.en: BOY: You can't escape!
(SIGHING)
I'm sorry. I don't think I can do this.
What? Jason, what is it?
All those people you were with...
translation.es: Las personas con las que estuviste.

translation.en: When I look at you, that's all I can see.
translation.es: Cada vez que te veo, solo veo eso.

translation.en: (DOOR OPENING)
ALL: Surprise! -KAYLA: Whoo! -(LAUGHING)
Hi.
Is it okay to hug you? I don't wanna break you.
translation.es: ¿Te puedo abrazar? No quiero romperte más.

translation.en: Oh, break my heart is more like it.
translation.es: El corazón es lo que me vas a romper.

translation.en: -Come here. -Go ahead.
I love you, Mom. I love you more.
translation.es: -Te quiero, mamá. -Yo te quiero más aún.

translation.en: I missed you all.
KAYLA: Me, too.
PETER: I'm glad you're home.
translation.es: Me alegro que estés en casa.

translation.en: -(DOOR OPENING) -NINA: Hi, Brina. She's in there, watching TV.
-(DOOR CLOSING) -BRINA: Okay.
What is this? You don't even like television.
translation.es: ¿Y esto? Ni siquiera te gusta ver televisión.

translation.en: It's numbing.
What the hell are you doing, Zoe?
You've been sitting in this house for months now.
The pity party officially ends today.
translation.es: Es hora de terminar este lamento.

translation.en: -Look, I need more time. -BRINA: Mmm-mmm.
Your time is up.
You need to get up, and get your behind back to work.
translation.es: Levántate y ponte a trabajar ahora mismo.

translation.en: This ain't fair to you or those beautiful kids of yours.
translation.es: No te lo mereces ni tú ni tus preciosos hijos.

translation.en: Now, come on. Come on. Uh-uh.
I'm not... I'm not ready to go anywhere yet.
translation.es: -No estoy lista para salir. -Zoe, por favor.

translation.en: I'm not ready to go.
Dr Spencer called this morning again.
translation.es: La Dra. Spencer volvió a llamar hoy de mañana.

translation.en: Says you're not taking her call.
translation.es: Dijo que no contestas sus llamadas.

translation.en: She asked that I make sure you get this.
translation.es: Me pidió que te entregara esto.

translation.en: You know what, Zoe? You can try to chase me away,
but I ain't going nowhere.
translation.es: pero no me iré de aquí.

translation.en: Listen to me, damn it!
Brina, I appreciate what you're trying to do, okay? -I really do. -(BRINA GASPS)
translation.es: Brina, aprecio tus intenciones, ¿sí? En serio.

translation.en: You did not just turn that television back on while I was talking to you!
translation.es: ¿Acaso encendiste la televisión mientras te hablaba?

translation.en: Okay.
If that's how it's gonna be, then...
translation.es: Si es lo que quieres, entonces...

translation.en: ...we will just watch TV.
translation.es: Nos quedaremos a mirar la tele.

translation.en: But I ain't going nowhere.
translation.es: Pero no me moveré de aquí.

translation.en: PETER: Grandma! KAYLA: Grandma!
Can I get a hug? Hello?
translation.es: ¿A mí no me darán un abrazo?

translation.en: Bye, babe. Mmm.
See you.
-(GRUNTING) -(KIDS GIGGLING) Silly banana...
All right, go ahead.
-BOTH: Bye, Dad. -What do we do first?
translation.es: -Bien, vayan. -Adiós, papá. -¿Qué se hace antes? -Lavarse las manos y hacer la tarea.

translation.en: BOTH: Wash our hands and do our homework.
translation.es: -¿Qué se hace antes? -Lavarse las manos y hacer la tarea.

translation.en: All right.
-How're you doing? -I'm good.
But you're not.
You know, the kids think we go to the hotel to let Mommy rest.
translation.es: Los niños creen que vamos al hotel para que su mamá descanse.

translation.en: I don't know how to tell them that we're apart.
translation.es: No sé cómo decirles que estamos separados.

translation.en: She loves you.
She messed up. But she needs you now, more than ever.
translation.es: Se confundió. Ahora te necesita más que nunca.

translation.en: And if I can forgive her, so can you.
translation.es: Y si yo puedo perdonarla, tú también puedes.

translation.en: What about your wedding vows?
translation.es: ¿Y lo que se prometieron en la boda?

translation.en: "In sickness and in health." Those weren't just words, were they?
translation.es: ¿"En la salud y en la enfermedad"? No lo dijeron por decir, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Yeah, what about honesty and faithfulness?
It's a sickness.
Well, I have trouble understanding that.
You two built this house and this family together.
translation.es: Esta casa y esta familia la hicieron juntos.

translation.en: And just because it doesn't fit into a perfect package,
are you willing to throw all that away?
Here.
-Thank you, sweetheart. -Mmm-hmm.
Welcome, everyone. Hi.
Looks like we have a new member.
translation.es: Creo que tenemos a una nueva integrante.

translation.en: Would you like to stand up and introduce yourself?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te presentas ante el resto?

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Zoe. -WOMAN: Hi.
And I am a sex addict.
When I was 10 years old, I was raped by three boys.
translation.es: Fui violada por tres chicos cuando tenía diez años.

translation.en: Uh, I buried that memory far, far away until...
translation.es: Quise dejar ese recuerdo en lo más profundo de mí, pero...

translation.en: ...someone I know
reminded me exactly why I had to remember.
translation.es: me hizo ver por qué tenía que recordarlo.

translation.en: It ruined my life.
It, uh, destroyed my family.
I, uh, would lie and cheat and do whatever I could to get that fix.
translation.es: Fui... ...capaz de mentir y engañar y de hacer lo que estuviera a mi alcance para solucionarlo.

translation.en: I love my husband.
(SOBBING) I know it's hard for him to believe that, but I do.
translation.es: Sé que le cuesta entenderlo, pero lo amo.

translation.en: I miss my friend.
I miss my best friend, and I know that
translation.es: Extraño a mi mejor amigo y sé que...

translation.en: with help from the one person that I hurt the most...
translation.es: ...con la ayuda de la persona a la que más herí...

translation.en: ...I can get better.
Our love is forever.
Always has been.
Always will be.
